description:
Triggered by Masato`s actions, his roommate and childhood friend Ren begins making passes at Haruka. However, Ren makes a habit of neglecting the academy`s assignments.
When Haruka learns Ren has received an ultimatum from the academy and may even be expelled, she begs him to turn in his assignment on time, but...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Believe Heart to the End of the World
